original_text: But at the time when Merab, Saul's daughter, should have been given to David, she was given to Adriel the Meholathite for a wife.
korean_text: 사울의 딸 메랍을 다윗에게 줄 시기에 므홀랏 사람 아드리엘에게 아내로 주었더라

sentences.original_text: But at the time when Merab should have been given to David
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 메랍이 다윗에게 주어져야 했던 그때에

sentences.original_text: she was given to Adriel the Meholathite
